From serene forests and flowing rivers to abstract interpretations of nature's energy.",image:"https://zigguratss.com/assets/upload/blog/zigguratss_23580bd6fc2e2abd7d22e7596bbcbaf8.jpg",author:"SAMEER KARMAKAR",date:"2026-02-06",link:"https://zigguratss.com/blog/nature-painting-most-beautiful-nature-paintings-on-canvas-for-modern-homes",category:"Nature Art"},{id:2,title:"Animal Painting: A Powerful Expression of Life and Emotion",excerpt:"Animal painting is one of the most captivating forms of visual art, representing strength, freedom, movement, and emotional depth. Abstract painting avoids copying the world as it is; instead, it talks to the soul directly with colors and shapes.",image:"https://zigguratss.com/assets/upload/blog/zigguratss_7de9b3e9dc1bc2b2be255db2e761f3ab.jpg",author:"SAMER KARMAKAR",date:"2026-01-02",link:"https://zigguratss.com/blog/why-abstraction-painting-is-perfect-for-modern-home-decor",category:"Abstract"},{id:5,title:"Chetan Katigar Paintings: A Journey Through Contemporary Indian Art",excerpt:"Chetan Katigar is a contemporary Indian artist known for his expressive use of bold colours and emotionally rich compositions. Drawn to art from early childhood, he developed a deep sensitivity for form, storytelling, and Indian cultural symbolism.",image:"https://zigguratss.com/assets/upload/blog/zigguratss_4b9363dade97fbb903c0999751461fd4.jpg",author:"SUPRIYA PAL",date:"2026-01-02",link:"https://zigguratss.com/blog/chetan-katigar-paintings-a-journey-through-contemporary-indian-art",category:"Artist Feature"},{id:6,title:"The Power of Thought: Discover Conceptual Painting at Zigguratss",excerpt:"In today's fast-paced world filled with visuals, only a few pieces of art truly stand out – those that make you think. Among the many luminaries who have left an indelible mark on Indian art, Raja Ravi Varma stands tall as a pioneer.",image:"https://res.cloudinary.com/dp2e8mfvm/image/upload/v1753375191/s4tgyrigukzxlpjprsqi.png",author:"AJAY SINGH, CO-FOUNDER",date:"2023-11-09",link:"https://zigguratss.com/blog/raja-ravi-varma-the-pioneer-of-indian-art",category:"Art History"}];const categories=["All","Nature Art","Animal Art","Landscape","Abstract","Artist Feature","Conceptual","Cultural","Modern Art","Indian Art","Home Decor","Fine Art","Art History"];const BlogSection=()=>{const[activeCategory,setActiveCategory]=useState("All");const[visibleCount,setVisibleCount]=useState(9);const sectionRef=useRef(null);const snapContainerRef=useRef(null);const activeIndexRef=useRef(0);const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=useState(0);const touchStartRef=useRef({x:0,y:0});const scrollLockRef=useRef(false);const pinSpacerRef=useRef(null);const pinInnerRef=useRef(null);const lastWheelRef=useRef(0);const lastTouchRef=useRef(0);const GESTURE_LOCK_MS=700;// Intersection Observer for scroll animations
useEffect(()=>{// Set a CSS variable with the current header height so the snap container

const setHeaderHeightVar=()=>{const header=document.querySelector('.header');const h=header?header.offsetHeight:80;document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--header-height',"".concat(h,"px"));};setHeaderHeightVar();window.addEventListener('resize',setHeaderHeightVar);const observer=new IntersectionObserver(entries=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add('visible');}});},{threshold:0.1,rootMargin:'0px 0px -50px 0px'});// Observe non-pinned animated elements only. // Helper to get current visible snap items

if(pinSpacerRef.current){const headerH=parseInt(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--header-height'))||80;const panelH=window.innerHeight-headerH;const start=pinSpacerRef.current.offsetTop;const target=start+idx*panelH;window.scrollTo({top:target,behavior:'smooth'});}else{// Fallback: Use smooth scroll to bring the snap item under the header
items[idx].scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth',block:'start'});}// unlock after animation completes (approx)
setTimeout(()=>{scrollLockRef.current=false;},700);};// Wheel (mouse) handler - supports vertical and horizontal swipes
const onWheel=e=>{// Only handle one wheel gesture every GESTURE_LOCK_MS
const now=Date.now();if(scrollLockRef.current||now-lastWheelRef.current<GESTURE_LOCK_MS)return;lastWheelRef.current=now;// Prevent default page scrolling to take full control
try{e.preventDefault();}catch(er){}const deltaX=e.deltaX;const deltaY=e.deltaY;// Ignore tiny scrolls
const thresh=25;let moved=false;// If we have a spacer, allow exit when at the ends
const spacer=pinSpacerRef.current;const items=getSnapItems();const lastIdx=items.length-1;if(Math.abs(deltaY)>Math.abs(deltaX)){if(deltaY>thresh){// scrolling down
if(spacer&&activeIndexRef.current===lastIdx){// scroll past the spacer to reveal load-more/footer
const headerH=parseInt(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--header-height'))||80;const start=spacer.offsetTop;const target=start+spacer.offsetHeight-headerH+10;scrollLockRef.current=true;window.scrollTo({top:target,behavior:'smooth'});setTimeout(()=>{scrollLockRef.current=false;},800);moved=true;}else{goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current+1);moved=true;}}else if(deltaY<-thresh){// scrolling up
if(spacer&&activeIndexRef.current===0){const headerH=parseInt(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--header-height'))||80;const start=spacer.offsetTop;const target=Math.max(0,start-headerH-10);scrollLockRef.current=true;window.scrollTo({top:target,behavior:'smooth'});setTimeout(()=>{scrollLockRef.current=false;},800);moved=true;}else{goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current-1);moved=true;}}}else{if(deltaX>thresh){goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current+1);moved=true;}else if(deltaX<-thresh){goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current-1);moved=true;}}// If we moved, set a short lock so multiple wheel events don't skip panels
if(moved){scrollLockRef.current=true;setTimeout(()=>{scrollLockRef.current=false;},Math.max(GESTURE_LOCK_MS,650));}};// Touch handlers for mobile swipe
const onTouchStart=e=>{const t=e.touches[0];touchStartRef.current={x:t.clientX,y:t.clientY};};const onTouchEnd=e=>{const now=Date.now();if(scrollLockRef.current||now-lastTouchRef.current<GESTURE_LOCK_MS)return;lastTouchRef.current=now;const items=getSnapItems();if(!items.length)return;const last=e.changedTouches?e.changedTouches[0]:null;if(!last)return;const dx=last.clientX-touchStartRef.current.x;const dy=last.clientY-touchStartRef.current.y;const absX=Math.abs(dx);const absY=Math.abs(dy);const swipeThresh=50;if(absY>absX&&absY>swipeThresh){if(dy<0)goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current+1);else goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current-1);}else if(absX>absY&&absX>swipeThresh){if(dx<0)goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current+1);else goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current-1);}// lock briefly after a swipe to avoid accidental multi-advances
scrollLockRef.current=true;setTimeout(()=>{scrollLockRef.current=false;},Math.max(GESTURE_LOCK_MS,650));};// Keyboard navigation
useEffect(()=>{const onKey=e=>{if(scrollLockRef.current)return;if(['ArrowDown','PageDown','ArrowRight'].includes(e.key)){e.preventDefault();goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current+1);}else if(['ArrowUp','PageUp','ArrowLeft'].includes(e.key)){e.preventDefault();goToIndex(activeIndexRef.current-1);}else if(e.key==='Home'){e.preventDefault();goToIndex(0);}else if(e.key==='End'){e.preventDefault();const items=getSnapItems();goToIndex(items.length-1);}};window.addEventListener('keydown',onKey,{passive:false});return()=>window.removeEventListener('keydown',onKey);},[]);const filteredBlogs=activeCategory==="All"?blogData:blogData.filter(blog=>blog.category===activeCategory);const visibleBlogs=filteredBlogs.slice(0,visibleCount);// Ensure only the active pinned snap-item has the 'visible' class so
// its children animate; others remain hidden while pinned.
useEffect(()=>{const items=getSnapItems();items.forEach((item,idx)=>{if(idx===activeIndex)item.classList.add('visible');else item.classList.remove('visible');});},[activeIndex,visibleBlogs.length]);const handleLoadMore=()=>{setVisibleCount(prev=>prev+6);};const handleCategoryChange=category=>{setActiveCategory(category);setVisibleCount(9);};// Scroll mapping for pinned panels (maps scroll position to activeIndex)
useEffect(()=>{const onScroll=()=>{// Don't react to scroll events while a programmatic scroll is in progress
if(scrollLockRef.current)return;const spacer=pinSpacerRef.current;if(!spacer)return;const rect=spacer.getBoundingClientRect();const headerH=parseInt(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--header-height'))||80;const start=rect.top+window.scrollY;// top of spacer relative to document
const panelH=window.innerHeight-headerH;const scrollY=window.scrollY;// Only map when spacer is in or near viewport
if(scrollY>=start-panelH&&scrollY<=start+spacer.offsetHeight-headerH){const rel=scrollY-start;// compute index by rounding to nearest panel
const idx=clampIndex(Math.round(rel/panelH),visibleBlogs.length);if(idx!==activeIndexRef.current){activeIndexRef.current=idx;setActiveIndex(idx);}}};window.addEventListener('scroll',onScroll,{passive:true});// run once to pick correct index on load
onScroll();return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',onScroll);},[visibleBlogs.length]);// Add a non-passive global wheel listener so we can reliably prevent
// browser default momentum scrolling when the pinned spacer is active.
useEffect(()=>{const wheelHandler=ev=>{const spacer=pinSpacerRef.current;if(!spacer)return;const headerH=parseInt(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--header-height'))||80;const start=spacer.offsetTop;const panelH=window.innerHeight-headerH;const scrollY=window.scrollY;// Only intercept while the spacer area is in view
if(scrollY>=start-panelH&&scrollY<=start+spacer.offsetHeight-headerH){// forward the native wheel event to our onWheel handler and prevent default
try{ev.preventDefault();}catch(e){}// adapt the native wheel event to the shape expected by onWheel
